articles.author: Brenda Goodman
articles.title: Exclusive: CDC hopes new ‘Wild to Mild’ ad campaign will tame skepticism about flu vaccines - CNN
articles.description: Some Americans have given up on flu shots because almost everyone remembers a season they got one and then got sick anyway.
articles.content:
Some Americans have given up on flu shots because almost everyone remembers a season when they got one and then got sick anyway.
Now the US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention wants to reset … [+5316 chars]

articles.title: Rupee Falls 10 Paise To Close At All-Time Low Of 83.14 Against US Dollar - NDTV Profit
articles.description: The rupee depreciated by 10 paise and settled for the day at an all-time low of 83.14 (provisional) against the US dollar today, weighed down by a surge in crude oil prices and strong American currency.
articles.content:
Rupee settled at 83.14 (provisional) against the US dollar, down 10 paise from its previous close.
New Delhi: The rupee depreciated by 10 paise and settled for the day at an all-time low of 83.14 (p… [+2157 chars]
